name: iPhone + Android Wallpaper Generator
description:
About this file

I needed a quick way to generate a bunch of wallpapers for a side project, and created this simple file to allow me to do it with just a few clicks.


Instructions

Simply replace the fill with your image in the master component, then export your device frames as needed.


Any requests on how I can make this better? Let me know in the comments.


@bryanmanio
